subtitle: A warming dish, ideal for a cold night. For extra zip. add a little curry powder when you add the cream.

method.text: Place haddock in pan with just enough water to cover. Poach for about 6 min or until cooked. Drain, reserving cooking liquor. Skin and flake fish.
Heat butter in a pan, add rice and cook for 2 min. Add water and reserved fish liquor. Bring to boil, then cover and simmer for 10-15 min until rice is tender. Drain.
Return rice to pan. Add fish, eggs, sweetcorn, half the Caerphilly, seasoning, cream and chopped parsley. Heat together, stirring gently.
Transfer to serving dish and sprinkle with remaining Caerphilly.

title: Caerphilly haddock
